europeana:record.dc:title: Beitrag zur Systematik und Nomenklatur der Paläarktischen Osmiini, mit Angaben Über Ihre Verbreitung
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Zanden, van der G.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera
Apidae
Megachilinae
systematics
nomenclature
distribution
europeana:record.dc:description: The author gives a preliminary list of all valid names of the species and subspecies of the Palaearctic Osmiini, including genera and their subgenera and notes on their distribution. Since Ducke (1900) no comprehensive study of this group of bees has been published. The list is a first step towards a complete revision and should be useful to future workers on this group.
